title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not always close the file
description: When attempting to close multiple saved files using the 'Close all saved' feature, it does not consistently close all the files as expected.
OB: When selecting 'Close all saved' from the menu, only some of the saved files are closed, while others remain open.
EB: It should close all the saved files, regardless of the number of files or their content.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open multiple files in the application. 
2. Save all the files. 
3. Select 'Close all saved' from the menu. 
4. Verify if all the saved files are closed.
